siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: Linksistent is a Chrome extension that provides a consolidated access point for up-to-date Figma design files or prototypes.
blogPost.body: Linksistent is a Chrome extension that provides a consolidated access point for up-to-date Figma design files or prototypes.
blogPost.title: Linksistent - A consolidated access point for up-to-date Figma designs.
blogPost.author: Samo Drole

localize.description: Linksistent是一个Chrome扩展，为最新的Figma设计文件或原型提供统一的访问点。
localize.tagline: 适用于最新Figma设计的整合接入点。

localize.description: Linksistent是一個Chrome擴展，爲最新的Figma設計文件或原型提供統一的訪問點。
localize.tagline: 適用於最新Figma設計的整合接入點。

previous.excerpt: Plan a full week of meals with a single click. Just tell us which foods you like, and how many calories, protein, fat, and carbs you want to eat. Swap out a meal, a day, or a week! We can fit in your treats, and even give you a grocery list!
previous.title: Prospre - Generate custom meal plans with one click

localize.description: 只需点击一下，就可以计划一整周的用餐时间。只要告诉我们你喜欢哪些食物，以及你想吃多少卡路里、蛋白质、脂肪和碳水化合物就行了。换一顿饭，换一天，或者换一周！我们可以安排您的款待，甚至还可以给您一张购物清单！
localize.tagline: 只需单击一次即可生成自定义餐饮计划

localize.description: 只需點擊一下，就可以計劃一整週的用餐時間。只要告訴我們你喜歡哪些食物，以及你想喫多少卡路里、蛋白質、脂肪和碳水化合物就行了。換一頓飯，換一天，或者換一週！我們可以安排您的款待，甚至還可以給您一張購物清單！
localize.tagline: 只需單擊一次即可生成自定義餐飲計劃

next.excerpt: Open, browse, and drop icons from your existing IconJars. Add, delete, or replace icons in existing IconJars. Or, export your artboards to a new IconJar right in Illustrator - on Mac or Windows. You don't need to have IconJar installed (but we recommend it).
next.title: Icon Mason - Open, edit, & create IconJars directly in Adobe Illustrator

localize.description: 从现有的IconJars中打开、浏览和拖放图标。添加、删除或替换现有IconJars中的图标。或者，直接在Illustrator中将画板导出到新的IconJar(在Mac或Windows上)。您不需要安装IconJar(但我们建议您这样做)。
localize.tagline: 直接在Adobe Illustrator中打开、编辑和创建IconJars

localize.description: 從現有的IconJars中打開、瀏覽和拖放圖標。添加、刪除或替換現有IconJars中的圖標。或者，直接在Illustrator中將畫板導出到新的IconJar(在Mac或Windows上)。您不需要安裝IconJar(但我們建議您這樣做)。
localize.tagline: 直接在Adobe Illustrator中打開、編輯和創建IconJars
